name: LAZY NINJA (Alpha version)
description:
Hi! Welcome to my new project "Lazy Ninja"

★★★STORY★★★

A fat ninja

Someone who only eats chips every day.

But someone who can also do something.

Drum roll...

In fact...  

Being a Lazy Ninja!

Movement: Arrow keys

FInish all 3 level to end the game!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

★★★PLEASE READ★★★

This game is still in Alpha and will be updated soon!

But please report in Game bugs!

Thank you for your understanding!

-Music-

EPIC Japanese Music - Ninja Star Inn

-CREDITS-

Inspired by @griffpatch and @xamuil2

Have fun and yes its really short!

And the end animation isn't finished yet.
